name: Snekrena
description:
Warning

The browser version has a lot of vfx removed due to performance issues. If you want fancy-ness, play the downloaded version.

Snekrena

Game made for the Marathon Jam, June-July 2021.

You must kill enemies to collect money and buy snake segments to defend your head.

Input Methods:
- Left / Right Arrow
- A / D
- Joystick Left / Right
- Dpad Left / Right
- Left / Right Click

Great game to play when bored, on a plane, train, or car.

Screenshots

Upcoming Features

  • Combo bonus
  • Different enemy types
  • Boss stages
  • Score calculated and shown on death
  • More types of segments
